summary: A premium, high-end website for The Cheeze Factory that balances playful brand personality with sophisticated design. The site serves as both an informational showcase (cheese history, production process) and a conversion engine (reservations, ordering, location). The design prioritizes typography-driven elegance, restrained color usage, and subtle motion to create an expensive-feeling experience.

style_notes: The design philosophy: 'Elevated Playfulness'—bold, playful personality treated with serious craft. Primary fonts: Playfair Display (Serif, Display) for headings and dramatic statements; DM Sans (Sans-Serif, Body) for readable, modern text. The font pairing creates an elegant foundation for the playful cheese theme without feeling juvenile. All text should have generous line length (60-70 characters), high-contrast headings (weight 600+), and consistent tracking. Avoid decorative fonts for body—prioritize readability and professionalism.
assets_needed: Hero imagery (dramatic cheese photography, hero product shot)
Brand colors (4-6 hex codes with variations)
